name: 3D Platformer (Werdna821)
description:
This is my 3D plat former tutorial for Cas 117.

Planned Modifications:

1. Changing level 2 from tutorial and adding at least one more new level.

2.  Changing the players stats (movement, health, animation, etc.)

3. Changing the enemies stats (movement, health, animation, etc.)

4. Adding new, unique level music.
